643:1: atha khalu bhagavān śākyamuniḥ sarvāvatī parṣanmaṇḍalopaniṣaṇṇāṃ devasaṅghānāmantrayate sma |
643:2: śṛṇvantu bhavanto mārṣā mañjuśriyasya kumārabhūtasya caryāmaṇḍalamantrasādhakamopayikaṃ rakṣārthaṃ sādhakasya paramaguhyatamaṃ paramaguhyahṛdayaṃ sarvatathāgatabhāṣitaṃ mahāvidyārājam |
643:5: mañjuśriyo'pi kumārabhūto'nena vidyārājñā ākṛṣṭo vaśamānīto sammatībhūtaḥ |
643:8: sarvavighnāṃśca nāśayatyeṣa mahāvīryaḥ prabhāvaḥ ekavīryaḥ eka eva sarvamantrāṇām agramākhyāyate |
643:12: sarvakāryakaraṇaṃ sarvamantracchedanaṃ duṣṭakarmiṇāṃ sarvapāpapranāśanaṃ sarvamantrapratipūraṇaṃ śubhakāriṇaṃ sarvalaukikalokottaramantrāṇāmuparyuparivartate apratihatasarvatathāgatahṛdayasarvāśāpāripūraka katamaṃ ca tat |
643:14: eṣa sa mārṣā paramaguhyatamaṃ sarvakarmikaṃ ekākṣaraṃ nāma vidyārājā anatikramaṇīyaḥ sarvasattvānām |
643:15: adhṛṣyaḥ sarvabhūtānāṃ maṅgalaṃ sarvabuddhānāṃ sādhakaḥ sarvamantrāṇāṃ prabhuḥ sarvalokānām īśvaro sarvavitteśānāṃ maitrātmako sarvavidviṣṭānāṃ kāruṇiko sarvajantūnāṃ nāśakaḥ sarvavighnānāṃ saṃkṣepataḥ yathā yathā prayujyate tathā tathā karoti asādhito'pi karmāṇi karoti|
643:16: mantrajapatā yaṃ spṛśati sa vaśyo bhavati vastrāṇyabhimantrya prāvaret subhago bhavati |
643:19: akṣiśūle saindhavaṃ cūrṇayitvā saptavārānabhimantrya akṣi pūrayet akṣiśūlamapanayati |
643:20: karṇaśūle gajaviṣṭhotthitāṃgarjānasambhavāṃ chatrikāṃ kedhukapatrāvanaddhāṃ mṛdvāgninā pacet |
643:21: sukelāyitāṃ sukhoṣṇaṃ saindhavacūrṇapūtāṃ kṛtvā saptābhimantritena karṇāṃ pūrayet |
643:23: prasavanakāle striyāyā vā mūḍhagarbhāyāḥ śūlābhibhūtāyāḥ āṭaruṣakamūlaṃ niṣprāṇakenodakena pīṣayitvā nābhideśaṃ lepayet |
643:24: sukhenaiva prasavati naṣṭaśalyo vā puruṣaḥ purāṇaghṛtaṃ aṣṭaśatavārānabhimantrya pāyayellepayed vā tatpradeśaṃ tatkṣaṇādeva niḥśalyo bhavati |
643:25: ajīrṇaviśūīcikāyātisāre mūleṣu sauvarcalaṃ saindhavaṃ vā anyaṃ lavaṇaṃ saptavārānābhimantrya bhakṣaye tasmāvdyādhermucyate tadaha eva svastho bhavati |
643:26: ubhayātisāre sadyātisāre vā mātuluṅgaphalaṃ pīpayitvā niṣprāṇakenoidakena tasmādābādhānmucyate |
643:27: sakṛjjaptena tu japtena vā vandhyāyāḥ striyā vā aprasavadharmiṇyāḥ prasavamākāṃkṣatā aśvagandhamūlaṃ gavyaghṛtena saha pācayitvā gavyakṣīreṇa saha pīṣayitvā gavyakṣīreṇaivādvālya pañcaviṃśatparijaptaṃ ṛtukāle pāyaye snānānte ca paradāravarjī gṛhī kāmamithyācāravarjitaḥ svadāramabhigacche |
643:28: svapatiṃ vā janayate sutaṃ tripañcavarṣaprasavanakālātirekaṃ vā anekavarṣaviṣṭabdho vā paramantratantroṣadhaparamudritaparaduṣṭakṛtaṃ vā garbhadhāraṇavidhṛtaṃ vā vyādhisamutthitaṃ vā anyaṃ vā yatkiñci vyādhiṃ paravidhṛtasthāvarajaṅgamakṛtrimākṛtrimagarādipradattaṃ vā sarvamūlamantrauṣadhimitrāmitraprayogakṛtaṃ vā saptaviṃśativārāṃ purāṇaghṛtamayūracandrakaṃ cekīkṛtya pīṣayet |
643:29: tataḥ supiṣṭaṃ kṛtvā śarkareṇa saha yojya harītakīmātraṃ bhakṣayet |
643:30: saptadivasāni ca śarkaropetaṃ śṛtaṃ kṣīraṃ pāyayed abhimantrya punaḥ punaḥ |
643:31: mastakaśūle kākapakṣeṇa saptābhimantritena umārjāyet svastho bhavati |
643:32: strīpradarādiṣu rogeṣu ālambuṣamūlaṃ kṣīreṇa saha pīṣayitvā nīlikāmūlasaṃyuktamaṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ kṣīreṇāloḍya pāyayet |
643:33: evaṃ cāturthaekāhikadvyāhikatryāhikasātatikaṃ nityajvaraviṣamajvarādiṣu pāyasaṃ ghṛtasaṃyuktaṃ aṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ bhakṣāpayet |
643:37: evaṃ mātaravālapūtanavetālakumāragrahādiṣu sarvāmānuṣaduṣṭadāruṇagṛhīteṣu ātmano hastamaṣṭaśatābhimantritaṃ kṛtvā gṛhītakaṃ mastake spṛśet |
643:39: ekajaptenātmarakṣā dvijaptena sahāyarakṣā tṛjaptena gṛharakṣā caturjaptena grāmarakṣā pañcajaptena yāmagocaragatarakṣā bhavati |
643:41: etāni cāparāṇi anyāni ca kṣudrakarmāṇi sarvāṇi karoti asādhite'pi |
643:43: ekāntaṃ gatvā viviktadeśe samudragāminīṃ saritsamudbhave samudrakūle gaṅgānadīkūle vā athavā mahānadīkūlamāśritya śucau pradeśe uḍayaṃ kṛtvā trisnāyī tricailaparivartī maunī bhikṣabhaikṣāhārasādhakaḥ yāvakapayo phalāhāro vā triṃśallakṣāṇi japet siddhinimittaṃ tato dṛṣṭvā tato sādhanamārabhet |
643:44: jyeṣṭhaṃ paṭaṃ tatraiva deśe tasmiṃ sthāne paṭasya mahatīṃ pūjāṃ kṛtvā suvarṇarūpyamayī tāmramṛttikamayairvā pradīpakaiḥ turuṣkatailapūrṇaiḥ gavyaghṛtapūrṇairvā pradīpakaiḥ pratyagravastrakhaṇḍābhiḥ khaṇḍābhiḥ kṛtavartibhiḥ lakṣamekaṃ paṭasya pradīpāni nivedayet |
643:45: sarvāṇi samaṃ samantāt samanantarapradīpitaiḥ pradīpamālābhiḥ paṭasya raśmayo niścaranti |
643:49: tato vidyādhareṇa sattvaramāṇarūpeṇa sādhakapaṭāntakoṇaṃ pūrvalikhitapaṭaḥ niḥsṛtaṃ arghaṃ dattvā pradakṣiṇīkṛtya sarvabuddhāṃ praṇamya grahetavyam |
643:50: tato gṛhītamātreṇa sarvapradīpagṛhītaiḥ sattvaiḥ sārdhaṃ samutpatati ekādhikavimānalakṣaṇaṃ vā gacchanti |
643:51: divyatūryapratisaṃyukte madhuradhvanigītavāditanṛtyopetaiḥ vidyādharībhiḥ samantādākīrṇaṃ taṃ sādhakaṃ vidyādharacakravartirājye abhipecayanti |
643:69: tata ekānte gatvā vigatajane niḥsaṅgasaṅgarahite mahāraṇyamanupraviśya yatra sthāne padmasaraṃ saritopetaṃ ekaparvatāśritaṃ parvatāgramabhiruhya ekākṣaraṃ vidyārājaṃ mañjuśrīkalpabhāṣitaṃ vā tathāgatānyabodhisattvabhāṣitaṃ vā anyataraṃ mantraṃ gṛhya teṣāṃ yathepsataḥ padmamūlaphalāhāro payopayogāhāro vā vidyā ṣaṭtriṃśallakṣāṇi japet |
643:70: japānte ca tenaiva vidhinā pūrvanirdiṣṭena jyeṣṭhaṃ paṭaṃ pratiṣṭhāpya padmapuṣpāṇāṃ śvetacandanakuṅkumābhyaktānāṃ khadirakāṣṭairagniṃ prajvālya pūrvaparikalpitāṃ padmāṃ ṣaṭtriṃśat sahasrāṇi juhuyāt ||
643:71: tato homāvasāne bhagavataḥ śākyamuneḥ paṭasya raśmayo niścaranti |
